At Layton Law Firm, we practice Employment Law for Northern California's Bay Area businesses--making sure the human element remains integral to everything we do for you. The size of your business doesn't matter. What matters is the core: the individuals who make your business happen. We like working with people who enjoy their work and respect their employees. 

Rona Layton discovered a passion for business and the law, specializing in serving small- to medium-sized businesses and nonprofit corporations for over 25 years. She represents clients in various legal matters affecting employers, from employee relations to wrongful termination. Ms. Layton is dedicated to protecting the interests of businesses while providing preventive advice to avoid litigation whenever possible.
